page.title: 20CHILDREN'S PASTIMES & CLUBS.
page.content: " Every Saturday I go riding at The Silver Horseshoe Stables in Hale.It costs Â£1.50 for an hour." "On Sunday mornings I go to Church. I am in the Choir and I get paid Â£1.50 every three months." "I have to do some piano practice every day and soon I will be taking Grade 111. I go to Ballet and Handi- crafts too." "Every Thursday I go to Girls' Brigade. We do drill and sing songs and play games.Sometimes we make things and sometimes we cook. We wear a smart black and white uniform." "On Thursdays I go to Brownies. We have to work to get badges and I am taking my Hostess badge. You have to invite someone to tea & I am going to make some cakes.Our uniform is brown." "I go to Kung Fu in the Village Hall. I do blocks,kicks & sweeps.It's great"
